Package report

Class PopupReportController

  • java.lang.Object
    • report.PopupReportController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class PopupReportController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    This class displays the income or orders report after receiving the data from the ReportController.

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
        initialize the labels based on the report type that selected from the ReportController and it's initialize the content of the report.
        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

      • initProductsAndItemsTypesVBox

        private void initProductsAndItemsTypesVBox()
        initialize the itemVbox based on the item types in the database and initialize the productsVbox based on the product types in the database. It's initialize the total of the income/orders for each item types or product types. Init the total products/items/custom produts income/orders (based on the reportType) and setting the name of the branch and the current month.
